thread.title: GOP healthcare plan will be 'affordable for everyone,' Pence says
thread.title_full: GOP healthcare plan will be 'affordable for everyone,' Pence says - POLITICO

author: politico.com
title: GOP healthcare plan will be 'affordable for everyone,' Pence says
text:
The GOP’s as-yet-incomplete replacement of the Affordable Care Act will “make health insurance affordable for everyone,” Mike Pence said Wednesday, making a notable tweak to Donald Trump’s claim that the plan would provide “insurance for everybody,” a claim Trump has since sought to walk back. “What the president elect’s made clear is that he also wants the Congress at the same time to pass a replacement bill that will lower the cost of health insurance and literally make health insurance affordable for everyone,” Pence told CNN’s Dana Bash, according to a transcript released by CNN. “I think it means making insurance affordable for everyone but also allowing for the kind of reforms in Medicaid on a state by state basis that will ensure -- that will make sure that we have health care coverage for the most vulnerable in our society.”
Pence promised an “orderly transition out of Obamacare” and sought to soothe the fears that have been expressed recently from op-ed pages to protests about what repeal might mean.
“And we don’t want anyone to be anxious who has insurance through an exchange or through the process of Obamacare,” Pence said. “And we don’t want people to be concerned that they’re going to lose that coverage and face hardship for their families but we want to set into motion the kind of reforms, first in Medicaid for the most vulnerable, and then secondly, for every American that will allow people to purchase health insurance across state lines, allow people to choose their own doctor, move into primary care and we really do believe that the American marketplace itself, with the right kind of reforms and incentives, and perhaps tax credits, can come together to make health insurance truly affordable for everyone.”
